description: Quick Access Popup is a multi-purpose launcher and folder switcher! It creates a customizable popup with favorites folders/documents paths and various actions to speed up your work. Freeware for Windows. Quick Access Popup was designed for all international versions of Windows 7, Windows 8/8.1 and Windows 10, both client and server versions, with Explorer windows, File Dialog Boxes (Open, Save, etc.*), Console Window (CMD command prompt) and many popular alternative file managers.
